name: kkday-lang-key-finder
description: Chrome extension for finding i18n translation keys on KKday websites

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dev: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.package: zip -r kkday-lang-key-finder.zip manifest.json icons/*.png src/popup src/content src/background src/lib -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
